definition: good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The nature's great power creates lingshan's spirit stones.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的鬼斧神工造化了灵山奇石。

sentences.english: The second part of the point source of the term for sending good luck and allusions.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分点出师造化一词的来源及其典故。

sentences.english: You are a shark of the first order, Euripides. So much the better for the firm!
sentences.chinese: 你可算得是第一流的奸商，这也是咱公司的造化。

sentences.english: Today he seemed truly touched by divine spirit, which spiritualized and elevated him .
sentences.chinese: 今天，他似乎真正得到了圣灵的造化，超凡如圣了。

sentences.english: You know all this, still meet and submission to the creation of bitterness.
sentences.chinese: 这一切你都明白，仍旧只为那场遇见而甘受造化之苦。

sentences.english: Rooted in tradition, learning from nature's painting masters.
sentences.chinese: 植根传统，师法造化的国画大师。

sentences.english: I greet you in the love and the light of our Infinite Creator.
sentences.chinese: 我在我们无限造化者的爱与光中向你们致意。

sentences.english: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
sentences.chinese: 造化弄人，竭力避免的事往往会发生。

sentences.english: Slandering creation with a false esteem.
sentences.chinese: 用假名声去中伤造化的真誉。

sentences.english: Driving on fiery wings to Nature's throne.
sentences.chinese: 驾着火轮向造化的宝座奔突。

sentences.english: Promote" imitate to build to turn" within the modern city water view design.
sentences.chinese: 提倡现代城市水景设计中的“师法造化”。

sentences.english: Let us throw ourselves into the whirlwind which has preceded the creation of form.
sentences.chinese: 让我们投身于造化的涡流。

sentences.english: Fourth, outside in teacher good fortune heart source.
sentences.chinese: 第四，外师造化中得心源。

definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
